description: Airbus Third Observer Seat Screw Replacement
instructions_json:
[{"instruction":"

Inspection of Third Observer Seat Part Number

  1. Gain access as necessary to read part number and serial number on the back of third observer seat (Attached to Circuit Breaker Panel 12XVU)
  2. Update DR with part number and serial number and route back to engineering for disposition

 

","notes":""}]
